mapper.select: SELECT SI.id AS tradeSalesItemId , SI.gacha_id , SI.trade_id , SI.gacha_item_id , GI.name AS gachaItemName , SI.price , SI.count , SI.current_count , SI.created_at FROM TRADE_SALES_ITEM SI LEFT JOIN GACHA_ITEM GI ON GI.id = SI.gacha_item_id AND GI.gacha_id = SI.gacha_id WHERE SI.trade_id = #{tradeId}
